sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
  import { MDXTag } from '@mdx-js/tag'
  

export default ({components, ...props}) => <MDXTag name="wrapper"  components={components}><MDXTag name="h1" components={components} props={{"id":"views-composition-model"}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="h1" props={{"aria-hidden":true,"href":"#views-composition-model"}}><MDXTag name="span" components={components} parentName="a" props={{"className":"icon-link"}}>{`#`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>{`Views Composition Model`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"atomic-design"}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="h2" props={{"aria-hidden":true,"href":"#atomic-design"}}><MDXTag name="span" components={components} parentName="a" props={{"className":"icon-link"}}>{`#`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>{`Atomic Design`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Views uses `}<MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"href":"http://patternlab.io/"}}>{`Atomic Design Composition Pattern`}</MDXTag>{` to ensure
interface consistency across all views.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="img" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"src":"atomic-design.jpg","alt":"What is Atomic Design Pattern?"}}></MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Views composition model is a collection of embeddable blocks.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="img" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"src":"BlocksComposition1.jpg","alt":"Composition model1 - embeddable"}}></MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Every `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`.view`}</MDXTag>{` file is a self contained component with a top level container block and content blocks.
As a component it can be used inside of any other `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`.view`}</MDXTag>{` file and styled at point of use.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="img" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"src":"BlocksComposition2.jpg","alt":"Composition model2 - point of use"}}></MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`The power of the atomized composition model allows components to become reusable templates as the
app's functionality and the design system grows.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`We use `}<MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"href":"https://github.com/facebook/yoga"}}>{`Yoga layout engine`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"containers-and-content-blocks"}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="h2" props={{"aria-hidden":true,"href":"#containers-and-content-blocks"}}><MDXTag name="span" components={components} parentName="a" props={{"className":"icon-link"}}>{`#`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>{`Containers and content blocks`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Containers wrap other blocks, displace, and align them.
`}<MDXTag name="img" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"src":"containerscontent.jpg","alt":"Containers and Content"}}></MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"containers"}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="h3" props={{"aria-hidden":true,"href":"#containers"}}><MDXTag name="span" components={components} parentName="a" props={{"className":"icon-link"}}>{`#`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>{`Containers`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ol" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Horizontal distributes blocks inside next to each other.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Vertical distributes blocks inside on top of each other.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`List repeats one block based on the amount of passed data.
`}<MDXTag name="img" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"src":"containers.jpg","alt":"Containers wire-frame"}}></MDXTag></MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Examples of final interface
`}<MDXTag name="img" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"src":"containersFinal.jpg","alt":"Containers final interface representation"}}></MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"href":"../Blocks/README.md"}}>{`More on containers`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"content-blocks"}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="h3" props={{"aria-hidden":true,"href":"#content-blocks"}}><MDXTag name="span" components={components} parentName="a" props={{"className":"icon-link"}}>{`#`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>{`Content blocks`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ol" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Capture block lets you capture user input as data.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Image block displays graphic files, like JPGs, PNGs, GIFFs, and more`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Text block renders text in the view.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`SVG block renders vector graphics.
`}<MDXTag name="img" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"src":"contentblocks.jpg","alt":"Content blocks"}}></MDXTag></MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"href":"../Blocks/README.md"}}>{`Examples of basic blocks`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"proximity-nesting-and-composer"}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="h2" props={{"aria-hidden":true,"href":"#proximity-nesting-and-composer"}}><MDXTag name="span" components={components} parentName="a" props={{"className":"icon-link"}}>{`#`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>{`Proximity nesting and Composer`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Proximity nesting (when you use code editor) is how we do composition inside a view.
You can think about your view as a stack of blocks where new lines set blocks apart.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Composer is a composition tool, and comes with Views Tools.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="strong" components={components} parentName="p">{`Example #1 In Composer`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="img" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"src":"nesting1.png","alt":"Nesting Levels 1 - Text inside the Second level container"}}></MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="strong" components={components} parentName="p">{`Example #1 In Code`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-views"}}>{`FirstNestingLevel Vertical
SecondNestingLevel Vertical
Text
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`In the example above, the hierarchy is:`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ul" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">
<MDXTag name="p" components={components} parentName="li"><MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`FirstNestingLevel`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ul" components={components} parentName="li">
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">
<MDXTag name="p" components={components} parentName="li"><MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`SecondNestingLevel`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ul" components={components} parentName="li">
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`Text`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="strong" components={components} parentName="p">{`Example #2 In Composer`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="img" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"src":"nesting2.png","alt":"Nesting Levels 2 - Text inside the First level container"}}></MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="strong" components={components} parentName="p">{`Example #2 In Code`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`What if we want to have the text at the same level of `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`InsideTop`}</MDXTag>{`? Our code
would look like:`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-views"}}>{`FirstNestingLevel Vertical
SecondNestingLevel Vertical

Text
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Our hierarchy now looks like:`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ul" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">
<MDXTag name="p" components={components} parentName="li"><MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`FirstNestingLevel`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ul" components={components} parentName="li">
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`SecondNestingLevel`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`Text`}</MDXTag>{`
That new line before `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`Text`}</MDXTag>{` separates it from `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`InsideTop`}</MDXTag>{`.`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Each new line will move blocks below one nesting level higher, and since a view
can only have one top level block, you can remove blocks from the view by adding
enough empty space before.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre">{`Top Vertical
Text


Text
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`In the example above, the second `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`Text`}</MDXTag>{` is outside of the top level container
therefore it won't render in the view.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"save-and-re-use-view-files"}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="h2" props={{"aria-hidden":true,"href":"#save-and-re-use-view-files"}}><MDXTag name="span" components={components} parentName="a" props={{"className":"icon-link"}}>{`#`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>{`Save and re-use .view files`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Views can be used as part of other views by referencing their file name.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Common use case: Say you have a View that contains a button with a text label and
you want to choose different label, or the fontSize depending where you use it.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Here're simple steps to extract blocks and re-use them:`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ol" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Save the button code to separate .view file and give it a name
starting with a capital letter`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Replace the previous button code with only the name of the extracted View,
in our example it's `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`Filename`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`From now on `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`Filename.view`}</MDXTag>{` is your Custom block and you will
see it being updated across your app upon any new changes.`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"use-case-one---change-text-at-the-point-of-use"}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="h3" props={{"aria-hidden":true,"href":"#use-case-one---change-text-at-the-point-of-use"}}><MDXTag name="span" components={components} parentName="a" props={{"className":"icon-link"}}>{`#`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>{`Use case one - change text at the point of use`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`This is a simple View with one Text block BEFORE using it as a Custom Block:`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="img" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"src":"reuse1.png","alt":"Button with Text block as part of it"}}></MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="strong" components={components} parentName="p">{`before`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-views"}}>{`Button Vertical
backgroundColor #009fff
borderRadius 8
Text
padding 20
color white
fontFamily Montserrat
fontSize 16
fontWeight 700
text BUY NOW!
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Take all the lines of the `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`Text`}</MDXTag>{` block and paste them to a new document. Save it
within your project as `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`Label.view`}</MDXTag>{`. If you want to reuse the `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`Label`}</MDXTag>{` in many places with
different text, turn it into slot by adding `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`<`}</MDXTag>{` before the value.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-views"}}>{`Label Text
padding 20
color white
fontFamily Montserrat
fontSize 16
fontWeight 700
text < default label
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`And here's how it should look like AFTER saving `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`Text`}</MDXTag>{` as `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`Label.view`}</MDXTag>{` file
and using it in the `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`Button.view`}</MDXTag>{` file:`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="img" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"src":"reuse2.png","alt":"Button with Text block used as a Custom Label block"}}></MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="strong" components={components} parentName="p">{`after`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-views"}}>{`Button Vertical
backgroundColor #009fff
borderRadius 8
Label
text BUY NOW!
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"use-case-two---change-the-size-of-the-font-in-one-place"}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="h3" props={{"aria-hidden":true,"href":"#use-case-two---change-the-size-of-the-font-in-one-place"}}><MDXTag name="span" components={components} parentName="a" props={{"className":"icon-link"}}>{`#`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>{`Use case two - change the size of the font in one place`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Back to our example. To change the font size in all instances of `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`Button.view`}</MDXTag>{`
change the `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`fontSize`}</MDXTag>{` value directly in the `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`Label`}</MDXTag>{`:`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="img" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"src":"reuse3.png","alt":"Button with Label block embedded from Label.view file and small font size"}}></MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="strong" components={components} parentName="p">{`before`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-views"}}>{`Button Vertical
backgroundColor #009fff
borderRadius 8
Label
text BUY NOW!
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-views"}}>{`Label Text
padding 20
color white
fontFamily Montserrat
fontSize 14
fontWeight 700
text < default label
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`And here's how it should look like AFTER saving `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`Text`}</MDXTag>{` as `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`Label.view`}</MDXTag>{` file
and using it in the `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`Button.view`}</MDXTag>{` file:`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="img" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"src":"reuse4.png","alt":"Button with Label block embedded from Label.view file and bigger font size"}}></MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="strong" components={components} parentName="p">{`after`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-views"}}>{`Button Vertical
backgroundColor #009fff
borderRadius 8
Label
text BUY NOW!
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Notice that we've changed the `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`fontSize`}</MDXTag>{` value in the `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`Label.view`}</MDXTag>{` and the `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`Button.view`}</MDXTag>{`
is affected but doesn't "know" anything about that change, since it happened in self-contained
`}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`Label`}</MDXTag>{` file.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-views"}}>{`Label Text
padding 20
color white
fontFamily Montserrat
fontSize 20
fontWeight 700
text < default label
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Reach out with questions via our `}<MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"href":"https://slack.viewsdx.com/"}}>{`Slack Questions Channel`}</MDXTag>{`.
Mention `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`@tom`}</MDXTag>{` or `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`@dario`}</MDXTag>{` to make sure that we get your notifications.`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
